creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: dense cluster of many different varieties of fish swimming in all different directions; other sea life near bottom including squid, lobster, shrimp, crabs, and snails
text: A mirage of fish are painted to extent of <I>horror i vacui<I>, completely covering the surface. All are depicted in meticulous detail with an almost scientific accuracy. Towards the bottom are crabs, lobster, prawn, a stingray, and flounder.
title: Eighty-eight Fish
